name: Poker Defense
description:
Castle Blue is under attack, and you're in charge of defense!

Poker Defense is a simple tower defense where you get a better poker hand (within one suit) in order to get better towers to blow back the enemies!

    

Get the highest score you can by creating the best possible maze of towers on the castle grounds!

Play with 7 different towers:

  • Arrow tower: Launches arrows at the enemies.
  • Sawblade tower: Launches sawblades!
  • Cannon tower: Launches cannonballs!
  • Piranha tower: Launches out piranhas to munch at the enemy!
  • Flamethrower tower: Blows fire over the enemy!
  • Lightning tower: Shocks the enemy!
  • Death laser: Death will be dealt swiftly upon the enemy.
